dcterms:creator: I. Hendrickx
S. N. Kim
Z. Kozareva
P. Nakov
D. O. S´eaghdha
S. Pad´o
M. Pennacchiotti
L. Romano
S. Szpakowicz
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 10,674 samples, of which 1,325 are causal. Each sample is a sentence annotated with a pair of entities and the type of their relationship. Sentences with a Cause-Effect relationship are treated as causal.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2010

dcterms:creator: P. Mirza
R. Sprugnoli
S. Tonelli
M. Speranza
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 2,470 sentences, of which 244 are causal. Causal sentences are identified using C-SIGNAL and CLINK tags, discarding causal relationships between entities from different sentences.
dcterms:title: Causal-TimeBank (CausalTB)

dcterms:creator: T. Caselli
P. Vossen
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 4,107 sentences, of which 77 are causal. Causal sentences are detected by examining the CAUSES and CAUSED BY attributes in the PLOT LINK tags.
dcterms:title: Event StoryLine (EventSL)

dcterms:description: The full biomedical causal detection dataset developed by the authors contains 13,342 sentences from PUBMED, of which 7,562 are causal. A publicly available subset contains 2,000 sentences, of which 1,113 are causal.
dcterms:title: BioCausal

dcterms:description: A publicly available subset of the BioCausal dataset containing 2,000 sentences, of which 1,113 are causal.
dcterms:title: BioCausal-Small
